Class Main

java.lang.Object
us.akana.tools.photo_renamer.Main
public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
Primary class for the Photo renaming tool, contains entry method
Author:
Jaden

      Opens the program window and populates it with all of its elements

    • lockInputs

      private static void lockInputs()
      Disables user inputs while the program is running. Sometimes we pull data right from the inputs; if they were changed while running that would be bad
      See Also:
      unlockInputs()

    • unlockInputs

      private static void unlockInputs()
      Re-enables user inputs after the program is done running
      See Also:
      lockInputs()

    • copyPhotos

      private static void copyPhotos​(java.io.File directory) throws java.io.IOException
      Copies photos from the given directory to the output directory (selectedFiles[1]) Recursive, will call itself on subdirectories
      Parameters:
      directory - working directory
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's an error copying the photos

    • copyImage

      private static void copyImage​(java.io.File image) throws java.io.IOException
      Copies the given image to the output directory (selectedFiles[1]), gathering all the relevant information for the new file name
      Parameters:
      image - the image File to copy
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's an error copying the image

    • checkCorrectSelections

      private static boolean checkCorrectSelections()
      Checks if the user has selected files and if the inputs are valid
      Returns:
      true if the selections are correct

    • updateInfo

      static void updateInfo​(InfoText text)
      Updates the text in info to a new value
      Parameters:
      text - the value to update to

    • copyFile

      static void copyFile​(java.io.File file, java.lang.String outPath, java.lang.String ext) throws java.io.IOException
      Copies a file - if the specified output path already exists, adds a number to the end
      Parameters:
      file - the file to copy
      outPath - the path to copy to
      ext - the file extension
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's an error copying the file
